text: The clinical relevance of tumor markers, such as SCC-Ag is controversial.Although the SCC-Ag may precede clinical diagnosis of recurrence in 46- $9 2 \%$ of cases (median lead time of 2-8 months)1860 there is no strong evidence that earlier detection of recurrence is associated with better survival in recurrent cervical cancer.
